about_the_game:
This is a collection of goodies for superfans who wish to go the extra mile to support the developers.

CONTENTS

  • An updated version of the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023 entry
  • Dungeon maps in PNG and Grid Cartographer formats
  • 3 rejected music tracks
  • Wallpaper

Please note that the updated Jam Version is only available in English and there are no plans to localize it to other languages.
